description.value:
Upper Case letters originated from drawers used to hold the movable type for letterpress printing. The capital letters were stored in a separate "case" that was located above the case that held the small letters.

﻿

Our team of keen professionals are experienced in design and development for websites & mobile applications - building on a collective background in the field of Architecture. Each project of the studio is a unique construction crafted with care, precision, and creativity. 


If you’d like to build a uniquely memorable experience for your brand - we would love to hear from you and collaborate.
